citation.abstract: Few studies report on validation of body composition changes using the four-compartment model (4C), and no such studies are available in strength training. Here we present such a validation study for the determination of body fat and fat-free mass changes in bodybuilders, who used exercise and androgenic-anabolic steroids.
citation.title: Body composition changes in bodybuilders: a method comparison.

video.title:
Body Fat Analysis; How Accurate is Bioelectrial Impedance Analysis
(BIA)?
video.summary:
Bioelectrial impedance analysis (BIA) is the most commonly used method for measuring body fat percentage and body composition.

How accurate is it?
How wide is the margin of error?
Can you track your body fat percentage over time?
